questions: Are there shops on the left in the image?
Are there shops on the right in the image?
Does the image present a comparison logic: shops on the left are livelier than shops on the right?
model_output:
yes, because there are visible storefronts on the left side of the image.
no, because the right side of the image does not show storefronts clearly.
no, because the comparison logic cannot be applied when there are no shops visible on the right.
